EmailTemplate.description: When Opp = WON this is sent to Account Executive requesting a Contract Admin Case
EmailTemplate.name: OppWonNeedContractAdminCase
EmailTemplate.subject: **For ASO Groups ONLY** Opportunity is Won, Please Create a Contract Admin case
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Opportunity {!Opportunity.Name} for Account {!Opportunity.Account} is now WON.
This is a reminder to submit a Contract Admin case.
Please follow the below instructions:
1) Open the Opportunity in Salesforce: {!Opportunity.Link} 2) Click on the Account Name link on the Opportunity. 3) On the Account Page click the "Request Hub" button located on the Account 360 View 4) Select â€œContract Admin" under Request Category picklist. 5) Complete the questionnaire and click continue.
You will be directed to the respective Contract Admin Case. Please fill in the required details and save the Case.
Thank you.
